aka: Workers 1971 - Nothing About Us Without Us

director.name: 克日什托夫·基耶斯洛夫斯基 Krzysztof Kieślowski

this_title: Robotnicy 1971 - Nic o nas bez nas
trans_title: Workers 1971 - Nothing About Us Without Us
introduction: Attempt to look at the Polish workers early seventies, their daily problems and concerns. After the protest in December 1970 years took place discredited Edward Gierek team and his companions, promising 'new Poland'. The workers, however, remain critical, suspicious, still eager to revolt. The original version of the film was never publicly shown. After the cuts and przemontowa...
